name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Continuous Dial (Design 2)

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the part
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the part
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the part
default: 0.0

content.name: radius
content.description:
the radius of the button
default: 15.0

content.name: active
content.description:
whether the part should be interactable or not
default: true

content.name: reset_value
content.description:
the position which the dial will return to when the part is double-clicked. If no value is provided, the resetting functionality will not be active
default: -none-

content.name: start_angle
content.description: the angle which will represent the 'minimum' position

content.name: max_angle
content.description:
default: -PI * 0.75 (south-west)
the angle which will represent the 'maximum' position
default: PI * 0.75 (south-east)

content.name: style_slot
content.description:
the colour of the space around the handle
default: {r:0.2, g:0.2, b:0.2, a:1.0}

content.name: style_handle
content.description:
the colour of the handle
default: {r:0.85, g:0.85, b:0.85, a:1.0}

content.name: style_needle
content.description:
the colour of the needle
default: {r:1.0, g:0.4, b:0.4, a:1.0}

content.name: style_interaction_disk
content.description:
the colour of the interaction disk
default: {r:1.0, g:0.0, b:1.0, a:0.1}
